some thoughts on epistemology

analysis is all about removing assumptions.
to abstract away our universe into dichotomies, rules, laws

i guess cs is in some ways so frustrating and powerful is because it forces those assumptions away.
everything in cs is deterministic, maybe not in a fast enough manner, but deterministic at least.
